definitions.definition: A holophrastic expression used to dismiss something that the speaker doesn't care about, doesn't think important, or doesn't want to consider or discuss any further. Sometimes conceived as an ellipsis of whatever you say , implying feigned deference: whatever you say [apparently must be true] .
examples: So you broke it? Whatever ! Get a grip.

main_definition: ( colloquial ) A holophrastic expression used to dismiss something that the speaker doesn't care about, doesn't think important, or doesn't want to consider or discuss any further. Sometimes conceived as an ellipsis of whatever you say , implying feigned deference: whatever you say [apparently must be true] .
